languages.text: "Я всегда бдительнее, когда в поле зрения появляется знать. Чернь крадет у хозяина вилки, дворянин — грабит целые миры".

traits.locale_text: "Я всегда бдительнее, когда в поле зрения появляется знать. Чернь крадет у хозяина вилки, дворянин — грабит целые миры".

languages.text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
languages.original_text: "Я всегда бдительнее, когда в поле зрения появляется знать. Чернь крадет у хозяина вилки, дворянин — грабит целые миры".

traits.locale_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
"I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
"I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
"I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
"I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
"I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

languages.text: 「貴族を相手にするときには、いつだって警戒を二重にしている。平民が盗むのは主人のフォーク1本だが、貴族は惑星全部を略奪するんだ」
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族を相手にするときには、いつだって警戒を二重にしている。平民が盗むのは主人のフォーク1本だが、貴族は惑星全部を略奪するんだ」

languages.text: "Ich verdoppele in Anwesenheit von Adeligen immer meine Leibgarde. Ein einfacher Bürger stiehlt seinem Herren Gabeln. Ein Adeliger plündert ganze Welten."
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verdoppele in Anwesenheit von Adeligen immer meine Leibgarde. Ein einfacher Bürger stiehlt seinem Herren Gabeln. Ein Adeliger plündert ganze Welten."

languages.text: « Je redouble toujours de vigilance en présence de la noblesse. Un roturier vole des fourchettes à ses maîtres, tandis qu'un noble pille des mondes entiers. »
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Je redouble toujours de vigilance en présence de la noblesse. Un roturier vole des fourchettes à ses maîtres, tandis qu'un noble pille des mondes entiers. »

languages.text: «Siempre redoblo la guardia en presencia de la nobleza. Un plebeyo roba tenedores a su amo; un noble saquea mundos enteros».
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre redoblo la guardia en presencia de la nobleza. Un plebeyo roba tenedores a su amo; un noble saquea mundos enteros».

languages.text: “只要是在贵族身边，我始终都会格外警惕。平民最多只会偷走主人的叉子，但贵族却可以洗劫整个世界。”
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."

traits.locale_text: “只要是在贵族身边，我始终都会格外警惕。平民最多只会偷走主人的叉子，但贵族却可以洗劫整个世界。”

languages.text: "Soyluların etrafında gardıma olabildiğince sıkı sarılırım. Köle, efendisinden çatal çalmakla yetinir; soyluysa tüm dünyayı yese doymaz."
languages.original_text: "I always double my guard around nobility. A commoner steals forks from his master; a nobleman ransacks entire worlds."
